findings.description: Griffel shorthand violation: `padding` with two space-separated values in makeStyles. Template literal `padding: `${tokens.spacingVerticalS} ${tokens.spacingHorizontalM}`` uses CSS shorthand which Griffel does not support. This will produce a runtime warning and may not apply styles correctly.
findings.suggestedFix: Replace with longhand properties: `paddingTop: tokens.spacingVerticalS, paddingBottom: tokens.spacingVerticalS, paddingLeft: tokens.spacingHorizontalM, paddingRight: tokens.spacingHorizontalM`
